display_long_description:
Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye is an immersive VR adventure puzzle game where you navigate a retro-futuristic city, solving mysteries and uncovering secrets.

# Welcome To Retropolis
Using Philip Log’s extendo-arms, the player is able to collect items from afar,  overcome obstacles, and move the plot forward.
[media]

# An Epic Sc-Fi Adventure
Dive into the gritty, neon-lit streets of Retropolis as robo-detective Philip Log in Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye. Unravel sinister mysteries and secrets in this standalone adventure, perfect for both new players and fans of the first game.
[media]

# A Breathtaking Handcrafted World
The entire game has been meticulously hand-painted within the VR space, boasting an astonishing overall 2.5 million virtual brush strokes, making every moment a stunningly detailed piece of art.
[media]

# Join the Revolution
Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye blends cinema, anime, and gaming to shape the future of entertainment while staying true to the classics.

[media]

# An Epic Sc-Fi Adventure
Dive into the gritty, neon-lit streets of Retropolis as robo-detective Philip Log in Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye. Unravel sinister mysteries and secrets in this standalone adventure, perfect for both new players and fans of the first game.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/86807788_438828728762828_3028083543319905064_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=DI86DASOvMoQ7kNvwEUPka7&_nc_oc=AdmfYlhunoXioAJULb1relWefuIY5IpnZ70pRvQJg6lAFMEp_KYo6hcOy0ucFBFre4g&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=E8H-fbPg92POcVwM9j5roQ&oh=00_AfLiR4sdH8qgTYtS8lN9vsnf3BQgEV9os_RknFmouN7rtA&oe=68450066)

# A Breathtaking Handcrafted World
The entire game has been meticulously hand-painted within the VR space, boasting an astonishing overall 2.5 million virtual brush strokes, making every moment a stunningly detailed piece of art.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974524_1327651051971635_5174114120836692723_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cud7KzeAa_AQ7kNvwHJx1Ey&_nc_oc=AdleRLTMeA-HTaCW8-yYSh6cUUhnQrLKFM_UQVt49dPqg9k0Ni0a4hJV0ljlCR_WZ5k&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=E8H-fbPg92POcVwM9j5roQ&oh=00_AfKhkIJg45vWMrgl0iZf3rzfxMIXHIxHcmPaBlOdKiLHmg&oe=6844F6CD)

# Join the Revolution
Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye blends cinema, anime, and gaming to shape the future of entertainment while staying true to the classics.
